reviewText: Outstanding perspective, it will change how you view your relationships with all of your customers.

I have watched this seminar several times and I keep getting more out of it. Scott Deming is so passionate about the idea of branding and he shares ideas that are easy to understand and take action on. There are lots of great stories and strategies that can be useful to business owners or to use for staff training. He is really able to explain how to get your customers to go out and sell everyone they know on you and your product. What could be more valuable?
